meanings.definition: A person who is between 60 and 69 years old.
meanings.sent1: Many sexagenarians enjoy spending time with their grandchildren.
meanings.sent2: The retirement community is filled with friendly sexagenarians.
meanings.sent3: The group of sexagenarians decided to start a band for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the park, the trees whispered secrets to the sexagenarians.
meanings.sent5: The wise sexagenarians shared stories of their youth with the younger generation.

meanings.sent1: The party was attended by a group of lively sexagenarians.
meanings.sent2: The event honored the contributions of the sexagenarians in the community.
meanings.sent3: During the dance, the sexagenarians showed off their impressive moves.
meanings.sent4: The library shelves were filled with books recommended by the sexagenarians.
meanings.sent5: The park bench was a favorite spot for the sexagenarians to gather and chat.
